text: Lɨci 19.19 Sng 2.2, CHL 16.16, 17.13-14 igɨlɨŋ fɨli hali sɨhɨm sabaŋ mugaŋ lamɨgaŋ me agaŋ hula manɨgali fɨli tɨbɨ mu mu migɨlavɨlalɨ agɨlaŋ hula nulɨdɨ sagaŋ hɨsɨŋ hulemɨlɨ agɨladɨ likɨla vave mɨgudɨbavi uami. Hulaŋ sabaŋ osɨ sabɨ hɨvɨ mɨgahɨni agadɨdaŋ nudɨ hulemɨlɨ agɨladɨdaŋ nagɨli lamavɨla sagaŋ lɨbɨbalu aba ve mɨgudɨbavi uami.
